content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(12.5, 13.5)
Consists of the following entities:
-  Steam engine (position 12.5, 13.5)
-  Steam engine (position 15.5, 15.5)
-  Steam engine (position 11.5, 13.5)
-  Additional poles (various positions)

### Copper plate mine at position(-28.5, -61.5)
Consists of the following entities:
-  Burner mining drill (position -28.5, -61.5) and a furnace at position(0.0, 0.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position -28.5, -61.5) and a furnace at position(2.0, 0.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position -28.5, -61.5) and a furnace at position(2.0, 2.0)

### Copper cable factory at position(0.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
-  Assembling machine (position 0.0, 0.0) and inserter (position 1.0, 0.0) that puts into assembling machine
-  Beltgroup (position 0.5) that connects the furnace at position 0.0 to assembling machine at position(0.0, 0.0)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Ensure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to insufficient resources
- Check your inventory and ensure you have enough resources before attempting to craft or build entities.
